item.description:
After long conversations with Karyn, who is leaving the area and no longer leading this group, I'm excited to pick up where she left off and organize events for the group.

For our first meetup I've selected a movie that I hope will be of interest to many of you in the group.  It's called Beyond Thought (Awareness Itself) and can be seen for free at the following link:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=IHcOvPtYE08

Watch it, take some notes, and be prepared to discuss it at our next event.

Since we no longer have access to a private meeting space, I've chosen Panera for our first meeting.  We can discuss alternatives at the meeting if anyone has better ideas for a location.
item.name: Discussion of movie Beyond Thought
